Data.//_: As with the weekly loan, quarterly loans are established by
Data.//-: changing the PPY field, in this case to '4'. The date of the
Data.//!: first payment causes an ambiguity for when the next payment is
Data.//*: to occur - on the 28th or on the last day of the month.
Data.//~: The 'LastDay' field resolves this ambiguity. Set it to true to
Data.//@: make the payments on the last day of each month, rather than the 28th.
